name: yappatron
description: always-on voice dictation for mac. no hotkeys. no toggles. just talk.

features.title: streaming text
features.body: Characters appear as you speak, just like typing. Watch your words flow in real-time.

features.title: built for vibe coding
features.body: Talk to your AI. Describe what you want. Auto-enters when you pause so Claude responds instantly.

features.title: faster than apple
features.body: 320ms latency beats native dictation. More accurate too. Local Parakeet model on Neural Engine.

features.title: fully local
features.body: All processing on-device. No cloud, no API calls. Your words never leave your machine.

steps.label: start talking
steps.detail: no button to press. just speak naturally wherever your cursor is.

steps.label: watch it stream
steps.detail: text appears character by character as you talk, with live corrections.

steps.label: pause to send
steps.detail: stop talking and it auto-presses enter. perfect for chatting with claude.

steps.label: keep going
steps.detail: it's always listening. start your next thought whenever you're ready.
